wiki.summary: “eternal sunshine“, the title track and fifth overall, is a direct nod to the film ‘Eternal Sunshine of The Spotless Mind’, which is a clear allusion towards the movie and its premise. It hones its narrative to be about Ariana and her Ex-husband, Dalton Gomez, desiring to wipe her mind as she would rather forget completely about the relationship than live through the pain of her divorce. Now being haunted by her ex-lover as stated by Elle Magazine Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “eternal sunshine“, the title track and fifth overall, is a direct nod to the film ‘Eternal Sunshine of The Spotless Mind’, which is a clear allusion towards the movie and its premise. It hones its narrative to be about Ariana and her Ex-husband, Dalton Gomez, desiring to wipe her mind as she would rather forget completely about the relationship than live through the pain of her divorce. Now being haunted by her ex-lover as stated by Elle Magazine, it juxtaposes the ordinary semantics of sunshine, highlighting the impossibility of forgetting with its pessimistic lyrics. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
